006
007package renderer.models_F;
008
009import renderer.scene.*;
010import renderer.scene.primitives.*;
011import renderer.scene.util.MeshMaker;
012
013/**
014   Create a wireframe model of a right square pyramid with its
015   base in the xz-plane and its apex on the positive y-axis.
016<p>
017   See <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pyramid_(geometry)" target="_top">
018                https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pyramid_(geometry)</a>
019
020   @see PyramidFrustum
021*/
022public class Pyramid extends Model implements MeshMaker
023{
024   public final double s;
025   public final double h;
026   public final int n;
027   public final int k;
028
029   /**
030      Create a right square pyramid with its base in the xz-plane,
031      a base side length of 2, height 1, and apex on the positive y-axis.
032   */
033   public Pyramid( )
034   {
035      this(2.0, 1.0, 15, 4);
036   }
037
038
039   /**
040      Create a right square pyramid with its base in the xz-plane,
041      a base length of {@code s}, height {@code h}, and apex on the
042      positive y-axis.
043
044      @param s  side length of the base in the xz-plane
045      @param h  height of the apex on the y-axis
046   */
047   public Pyramid(final double s, final double h)
048   {
049      super(String.format("Pyramid(%.2f,%.2f)", s, h));
050
051      this.s = s;
052      this.h = h;
053      this.n = 1;
054      this.k = 1;
055
056      // Create the pyramid's geometry.
057      addVertex(new Vertex(-s/2, 0, -s/2),  // base
058                new Vertex(-s/2, 0,  s/2),
059                new Vertex( s/2, 0,  s/2),
060                new Vertex( s/2, 0, -s/2),
061                new Vertex(  0,  h,   0));  // apex
062
063      // Create 5 faces.
064      // Make sure the faces are all
065      // oriented in the same way!
066      addPrimitive(new Face(0, 3, 2, 1),   // base
067                   new Face(4, 0, 1),      // 4 sides
068                   new Face(4, 1, 2),
069                   new Face(4, 2, 3),
070                   new Face(4, 3, 0));
071   }
072
073
074   /**
075      Create a right square pyramid with its base in the xz-plane,
076      a base length of {@code s}, height {@code h}, and apex on the
077      positive y-axis.
078
079      @param s  side length of the base in the xz-plane
080      @param h  height of the apex on the y-axis
081      @param n  number of lines of latitude around the body of the pyramid
082      @param k  number of triangles in the triangle fan at the top of each side
083      @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code n} is less than 1
084      @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code k} is less than 1
085   */
086   public Pyramid(final double s, final double h,
087                  final int n, final int k)
088   {
089      this(s, h, n, k, false);
090   }
091
092
093   /**
094      Create a right square pyramid with its base in the xz-plane,
095      a base length of {@code s}, height {@code h}, and apex on the
096      positive y-axis.
097   <p>
098      The last parameter provides a choice between having a square
099      grid of lines or a line fan in the base of the pyramid.
100
101      @param s  side length of the base in the xz-plane
102      @param h  height of the apex on the y-axis
103      @param n  number of lines of latitude around the body of the pyramid
104      @param k  number of triangles in the triangle fan at the top of each side
105      @param grid  choose either a square grid or a line fan in the base
106      @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code n} is less than 1
107      @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code k} is less than 1
108   */
109   public Pyramid(double s, double h,
110                  final int n, final int k,
111                  final boolean grid)
112   {
113      super(String.format("Pyramid(%.2f,%.2f,%d,%d)", s, h, n, k));
114
115      if (n < 1)
116         throw new IllegalArgumentException("n must be greater than 0");
117      if (k < 1)
118         throw new IllegalArgumentException("k must be greater than 0");
119
120      this.s = s;
121      this.h = h;
122      this.n = n;
123      this.k = k;
124
125      // Create the pyramid's geometry.
126      final double deltaH = h / n;
127
128      // An array of vertices to be used to create faces.
129      final Vertex[][] v = new Vertex[n][4*k + 1];
130
131      // Create the vertices.
132      for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) // choose a height of latitude
133      {
134         final double y = i * deltaH;
135       //final double slantSide = s * (1.0 - i*(1.0 / n));
136         final double slantSide = s - i*(s / n);
137         final double deltaS = slantSide / k;
138
139         for (int j = 0; j < k; ++j)
140         {
141            v[i][j] = new Vertex(-slantSide/2 + j*deltaS,
142                                  y,
143                                 -slantSide/2);
144
145            v[i][k+j] = new Vertex( slantSide/2,
146                                    y,
147                                   -slantSide/2 + j*deltaS);
148
149            v[i][2*k+j] = new Vertex( slantSide/2 - j*deltaS,
150                                      y,
151                                      slantSide/2);
152
153            v[i][3*k+j] = new Vertex(-slantSide/2,
154                                      y,
155                                      slantSide/2 - j*deltaS);
156         }
157         // create one more vertex to close the latitude
158         v[i][4*k] = new Vertex(v[i][0].x, v[i][0].y, v[i][0].z);
159      }
160
161      // Add the vertices to this model.
162      for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
163      {
164         for (int j = 0; j < 4*k + 1; ++j)
165         {
166            addVertex( v[i][j] );
167         }
168      }
169      addVertex(new Vertex(0, h, 0),
170                new Vertex(0, 0, 0));
171      final int apexIndex = n * (4*k + 1),
172                bottomCenterIndex = apexIndex + 1;
173
174
175      // Create the triangle fan at the apex.
176      for (int j = 0; j < 4*k; ++j)
177      {  //                                 v[n-1][j+1]         v[n-1][j]
178         addPrimitive(new Face(apexIndex, (n-1)*(4*k+1)+j+1, (n-1)*(4*k+1)+j));
179      }
180
181      // Create all the square strips around the pyramid wall.
182      for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; ++i) // choose a height of latitude
183      {
184         for (int j = 0; j < 4*k; ++j)
185         {  //                      v[i][j]      v[i+1][j]         v[i+1][j+1]       v[i][j+1]
186            addPrimitive(new Face(i*(4*k+1)+j, (i+1)*(4*k+1)+j, (i+1)*(4*k+1)+j+1, i*(4*k+1)+j+1));
187         }
188      }
189
190      if (grid)
191      {
192         // Create the grid in the base of the pyramid.
193         // Arrays of indices to be used to create the grid.
194         final int[][] vGrid = new int[k+1][k+1];
195         int vIndex = vertexList.size();
196         // Create vertices for the bottom grid.
197         final double deltaS = s / k;
198         for (int i = 0; i < k + 1; ++i)
199         {
200            for (int j = 0; j < k + 1; ++j)
201            {
202               addVertex(new Vertex(-s/2 + i * deltaS,
203                                     0,
204                                    -s/2 + j * deltaS));
205               vGrid[i][j] = vIndex;
206               vIndex += 1;
207            }
208         }
209         // Create the faces in the base grid.
210         for (int i = 0; i < k; ++i)
211         {
212            for (int j = 0; j < k; ++j)
213            {
214               addPrimitive(new Face(vGrid[i  ][j  ],
215                                     vGrid[i+1][j  ],
216                                     vGrid[i+1][j+1],
217                                     vGrid[i  ][j+1]));
218            }
219         }
220      }
221      else
222      {
223         // Create the triangle fan in the base.
224         for (int j = 0; j < 4*k; ++j)
225         {  //                                       v[0][j]  v[0][j+1]
226            addPrimitive(new Face(bottomCenterIndex,    j,       j+1));
227         }
228      }
229   }
230
231
232
233   // Implement the MeshMaker interface (three methods).
234   @Override public int getHorzCount() {return n;}
235
236   @Override public int getVertCount() {return k;}
237
238   @Override
239   public Pyramid remake(final int n, final int k)
240   {
241      return new Pyramid(this.s, this.h,
242                         n, k);
243   }
244}//Pyramid
